long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-Powered Unbiased and Hallucination-Free Global Information Search

Let AI help you search for the best global information resources in your native language, gaining diverse and uncontrolled perspectives and understanding, all completely free.

BiLin AI Search Engine Sidebar: A free browser extension to help you better search global information with AI! ğŸŒâœ¨

How to use the BiLin AI extension? ğŸ¤–  
After installation, simply search on bilin.ai without any additional setup. ğŸŒ User-friendly and easy to use. ğŸ‘ The assistant extension automatically activates when needed, requiring no extra action from you. ğŸ”âœ¨

Main features of BiLin AI:
ğŸ¤© AI Sidebar Synchronized Search: Instantly invoke the sidebar during any search engine query without re-entering, directly helping you search global information, perform cross-verification, and eliminate hallucinations and biases.
ğŸ’¬ Search Global Information in Your Native Language: AI technology automatically translates your search terms into various languages, accessing a wealth of reliable global information resources to provide you with the most accurate answers.
ğŸ“° Web Page Translation: After installing the plugin, any webpage searched on bilin.ai is automatically translated into your native language by the AI translation engine, with bilingual comparison, eliminating comprehension issues.
ğŸ¥ Video Translation: Also supports bilingual subtitle translation for YouTube videos.

Ready to enhance your web search and reading efficiency? Get BiLin now!

â“ Frequently Asked Questions
â€¢ Is BiLin free?  
Yes, BiLin is completely free! Both the extension and AI search services are free of charge.

â€¢ What is the BiLin AI Search Engine Sidebar?  
The BiLin AI Search Engine Sidebar is a browser extension designed for AI-powered unbiased and hallucination-free global information search.

â€¢ How do I install the BiLin browser extension?  
To start using BiLin, click the "Add to Chrome" button, install the extension, and visit bilin.ai to begin your AI search journey.

â€¢ What information does BiLin collect?  
Your data is confidential and not used for advertising or commercial purposes, only for debugging and product improvement.

â€¢ How can we be contacted?  
We would love to hear your feedback! Please send an email to support@bilin.ai, and we will respond to your suggestions as soon as possible.

Start your BiLin AI journey now! ğŸš€
